title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the ultimate kitchen companion for all your baking needs! With more than 20 color variants to choose from, this mixer not only looks great on your countertop but also offers exceptional performance.

This powerhouse mixer has a capacity to make 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, thanks to its 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl. The 59 touch points planetary mixing ensures thorough and precise mixing every time.

Included with the mixer are essential attachments such as the Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The durable metal construction and comfortable handle make it easy to use and clean. 

With a tilt-head design, 10 speed settings, and the option to add over 10 hub-powered attachments (sold separately), the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is a versatile and indispensable tool for any home baker. Upgrade your baking game with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer today!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, a powerhouse in the kitchen with over 20 color variants to choose from! This mixer has a large capacity, able to handle 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. With 59 touch points for planetary mixing, you can be sure your ingredients are thoroughly combined. 

Included with the mixer are a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield. The durable metal construction ensures longevity, while the comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe bowl make clean-up a breeze. 

This tilt-head design mixer offers 10 speeds and over 10 optional attachments for endless culinary possibilities. Don't miss out on the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer - a must-have for any aspiring chef or baker!

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, the perfect addition to your kitchen arsenal! With more than 20 color variants to choose from, this mixer is as stylish as it is functional. Its 5-quart stainless steel bowl can handle 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, making your baking tasks a breeze.

Featuring 59 touch points for planetary mixing, the KitchenAid 5 ensures thorough and consistent mixing every time. The package includes a Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield for all your baking needs.

Constructed with durable metal, this tilt-head mixer offers 10 speed settings for ultimate control. With over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is truly versatile and customizable to suit all your culinary adventures. Upgrade your baking game with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer today!
